citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15-1:00 PM
on 02-Apr-18.
Arrived on the premises, rang the doorbell and left a message on the licensee's cell. Waited 45 minutes and then
left.

narrative:
